description: MCT oil enhances brain function through its ability to produce more ketones. The treatment benefits patients who have Alzheimer's disease and epilepsy, because it provides an alternative energy source for their brains. Research shows that MCT oil consumption leads to better memory performance, enhanced thinking abilities and mental focus

Four individuals have been arrested, and 31 illegal health facilities sealed as investigations continue.

description: India skipper Suryakumar Yadav criticised the Asian Cricket Council for denying his team the Asia Cup 2025 trophy despite a hard-fought triumph over Pakistan in the final. Calling his teammates the “real trophies,” he stressed the significance of the win while dismissing concerns over his form. In a heartfelt gesture, Suryakumar announced he would donate his match fees to the Indian armed forces.

title: 7-year-old Class 2 student hung upside down by school bus driver in Panipat over ‘misbehaviour’; FIR filed
description: The incident that took place over a month ago came to light when the boy’s mother stumbled upon the video on Instagram on Saturday

title: ‘They’ve already taken our water sources, temples, cremation ground’: NSG eviction notice to village near Delhi Airport sparks uproar

Three men arrested for jewellery heist near Bharat Mandapam; one at large
Bengaluru: Class 9 boy assaulted after intervening in parents’ fight; mother booked
description: A 14-year-old boy accused his mother of assaulting him, causing severe hand injuries, after he intervened in a fight between his parents. Police registered a case against the mother under the Juvenile Justice Act and BNS sections for voluntarily causing hurt and using dangerous means.

title: Nepal: Probe panel bars former PM Oli from travelling abroad

'Best Oval Office ever': Trump hails 24-Karat gold revamp
description: Donald Trump praised the 24-karat gold in the Oval Office and Cabinet Room, calling it the "best ever" and noting foreign leaders' awe. He personally purchased and expanded the gold decor, adding trim, cherubim, and trophies. His "gold guy" replicated Mar-a-Lago's gilded style, leading to a "golden office for the golden age."

title: ‘Godman’ who molested 17 women stayed in 13 hotels in 2 months, faked UN posts for favours — arrested in Agra

Congress writes to Amit Shah over BJP panelist’s ‘death threat’ to Rahul Gandhi
Cancer cases in India up by 26%, deaths 21% since 1990
description: Cancer incidence in India surged by 26% since 1990, with deaths up 21%, contrasting sharply with declines in the US and China. This rise is attributed to high tobacco use, obesity, and inadequate early detection. Experts advocate for stronger prevention, expanded screening, and increased tobacco taxes to reverse this alarming trend.

title: PM Modi meets Vice President Radhakrishnan
description: "Hon'ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi met with Hon'ble Vice-President Shri C P Radhakrishnan at the Vice-President's Enclave today," the Vice President's secretariat said on X.

title: UAE remains top destination for Indians' outbound travel
description: Indian nationals' departures reached 30.8 million in 2024, with the UAE leading as the top destination, attracting 7.8 million travelers. Leisure and diaspora visits primarily drove this significant increase, supported by higher disposable incomes and improved air connectivity. The 25-44 age group constituted the largest share of travelers, reflecting a robust post-pandemic recovery.

title: Government aims to integrate Ayurveda into health education curriculum in schools, colleges: Minister
description: Discussions are underway with NCERT and UGC for preparing course modules for the school education and higher education, says Prataprao Jadhav

title: India's strained ties with US won't hit our relations: Russia
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov affirmed the India-Russia economic partnership remains strong, despite India-US tensions. He praised India's "self-respect" and independent foreign policy in securing its energy interests, particularly regarding Russian oil imports. Lavrov highlighted Russia's full respect for India's national interests and confirmed President Putin's December visit for the annual summit.

title: BCCI to lodge protest against Naqvi after Asia Cup trophy presentation fiasco
description: “We came along with the medals, so it is very unfortunate, very unsporting and we hope that the trophy and the medals will be returned to India as soon as possible”, said Devajit Saikia, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) secretary.

title: Asia Cup | BCCI secretary Devajit Saikia to Pak board chief Mohsin Naqvi: ‘Return trophy and medals as soon as possible’
Durga Puja revellers flock early to pandals in West Bengal fearing rain
description: Durga Puja festivities will peak over the next four days of Saptami, Ashtami, Navami, and Dashami; large crowds were seen in Kolkata, its suburbs, and in the districts across West Bengal on Sasthi, the sixth day of the festival

title: Horoscope Today, September 29, 2025: Astrological Insights for Scorpio, Gemini, Capricorn, Libra, and Every Sun Sign
There is still room for talks with Maoists: Chhattisgarh CM Vishnu Deo Sai
description: Chhattisgarh Chief Minister says the double-engine government has played a significant role in the fight against Maoists in the State; he says tourism is a focus area in Bastar because of its natural beauty, and agriculture and dairy will be promoted because tribal communities have a particular interest in farming; the State has received investment proposals worth ₹7 lakh crore in just 10 months, he adds

title: ‘Bibi wants the deal too’: Trump says Gaza plan well-received
description: US President Donald Trump voiced optimism for his 21-point Gaza peace plan, citing a "very good response" and anticipating Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu's support. The UN-unveiled proposal includes hostage returns and renewed dialogue for coexistence. Trump and Netanyahu are set to meet Monday to finalize the deal, aiming for a new regional future.

title: Making of tragedy: Vijay's late entry, roadshow & payday rush
description: A deadly stampede at a TVK rally in Karur claimed 40 lives, largely due to president Vijay's delayed arrival, which swelled the crowd far beyond the venue's capacity. Congestion worsened as his vehicle moved through the packed area, and darkness from a power disruption triggered chaos, leading to the tragic crush.

title: Going beyond the metaphor ‘young at heart’
description: Cardiovascular diseases, once considered to be primarily an old age-related affliction, are now increasingly affecting the younger generations

description: A shared comprehensive understanding of the landscape needs to be integrated into the green economy transition to assess and improve ecological functions such as air and water quality, habitat support, and climate regulation

title: Asia Cup trophy not awarded to champions India after they refuse to accept it from ACC chief Mohsin Naqvi
description: Once Mohsin Naqvi took the dais, he was informed that Indian team won't accept the trophy if he tries to force himself and an official protest would be lodged.

title: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta launches 300 e-buses for trans-Yamuna connectivity
description: Entire public transport fleet to turn electric within next 18 months, says Gupta, inaugurates 6-lane flyover; detailed study under way to expand bus network across Capital, says Transport Minister

title: Azam Khan, son subjected to slow poisoning in jail, says ex-RS MP Shahid Siddiqui
description: Former UP minister Azam Khan, recently released from jail, was admitted to a Delhi hospital. Journalist Shahid Siddiqui met Khan and claimed the leader alleged slow poisoning in prison for himself and his son. Khan reportedly stopped consuming jail food due to these suspicions. He believes a conspiracy aimed to eliminate him, similar to Mukhtar Ansari.

For Jemimah, a long-awaited ODI World Cup dream comes true
description: As India gears up for the 50-over extravaganza, Jemimah Rodrigues is no longer the prodigy watching from the stands or the teenager welcoming returning heroes at the airport. She is the hero in waiting, ready to script the kind of homecoming that inspired her journey in the first place

description: Sixteen people named in the FIR and around 50 unidentified people were part of the mob that attacked the police

Op Sindoor on games field, outcome is the same: PM as India beats Pak in Asia Cup final
description: India secured a thrilling Asia Cup 2025 triumph over Pakistan, winning by five wickets in Dubai. Prime Minister Modi celebrated the victory with a viral tweet, declaring "#OperationSindoor". Tilak Varma's unbeaten 69 anchored India's chase of 147, while Kuldeep Yadav's 4/30 dismantled Pakistan's batting. This dominant win, marked by intense rivalry, clinched India's record-extending ninth Asia Cup crown.

description: A deadly stampede at TVK chief Vijay's political rally in Karur claimed 40 lives, leaving Emoor village and other families in profound grief. Five victims hailed from Emoor, including a man who lost his wife and daughter. Another couple tragically lost their daughter and her fiancé.

Mayoral shake-up: NYC mayor Eric Adams ends reelection bid; clears way for three-way race
description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams has ended his reelection bid, setting up a three-way race for the city's top office between Zohran Mamdani, Andrew Cuomo, and Curtis Sliwa. Adams' withdrawal, announced via video, comes amidst low poll numbers and a corruption scandal, though his name will still appear on the November ballot. This significantly alters the mayoral contest.

description: Several NATO countries say Russian fighter jets and drones have violated their airspace in Europe over recent weeks, accusing Moscow of testing the alliance.

description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang urges Washington to allow US tech companies open competition in China, asserting it benefits American economic and geopolitical influence. He warns China's chip industry is "nanoseconds behind" the US, highlighting its rapid advancements.

Woman diagnosed with aggressive breast cancer, after doctors said it was ‘nothing’
description: A 35-year-old woman, initially dismissed a breast lump, attributing it to hormonal changes. Despite a family history, she was advised against early mammograms. Mammogram is a screening test to detect breast cancer in people with no symptoms and diagnosis to investigate symptoms or abnormalities found during a physical exam. Diagnosed with aggressive breast cancer while pregnant, she bravely underwent treatment to save herself and her baby, emphasizing the danger of ignoring symptoms.

title: Sidhu Moose Wala’s father eyes poll debut from slain singer’s seat Mansa
description: Balkaur Singh, father of slain rapper Sidhu Moose Wala, announced his intention to contest the 2027 Punjab assembly elections from Mansa, his son's former constituency. He aims to carry his son's photo into the legislative assembly, fulfilling an unachieved dream.

title: H-1B visa policy change: Canada PM responds to Trump's order
description: President Trump's significant H-1B visa fee increase to $100,000 has created a stir, prompting Canada to consider attracting highly skilled professionals. Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and industry experts view this as a "wonderful opportunity" to draw talent left stranded by the US policy, despite potential challenges within Canada's immigration system.

title: Giants rookie Jaxson Dart hit by false Madison Beer rumor before facing Herbert
description: Rookie Giants quarterback Jaxson Dart faces a dramatic NFL debut, embroiled in a viral controversy involving a fake Instagram post linking him to Madison Beer, rumored girlfriend of Chargers QB Justin Herbert. Dart, replacing Russell Wilson, aims to make history by defeating Herbert's undefeated Chargers in his first start, despite the off-field distraction.

title: Taylor Swift leaves Selena Gomez’s wedding early to rejoin Kelce
description: Taylor Swift attended Selena Gomez's wedding in California. She then flew to Kansas City. Swift supported her fiancé Travis Kelce. He had a game against the Baltimore Ravens. This trip showed her commitment to both friends and romance. She left the wedding late Saturday night. Her private jet landed in Missouri with hours to spare.

title: Ed Sheeran’s Swift–Kelce comment has fans questioning his bond with her
description: Ed Sheeran's confession that he learned of Taylor Swift's engagement to Travis Kelce via Instagram has fueled speculation about a crack in their friendship. Fans are questioning their bond, recalling past instances of perceived disloyalty. Neither has responded, while Swift is reportedly focused on planning her wedding for next summer.
